name: laravel-inertia-react
description: Comprehensive patterns for building modern monolithic applications with Laravel, Inertia.js, and React. Covers page components, forms, navigation, shared data, and persistent layouts.
author: Asyraf Hussin

references.name: Inertia.js Documentation
references.description: Official Inertia.js documentation covering React adapter, routing, forms, and more

references.name: Laravel Documentation
references.description: Laravel framework documentation for backend API and routing

references.name: React Documentation
references.description: Official React documentation for hooks, components, and TypeScript

references.name: Ziggy Documentation
references.description: Use Laravel named routes in JavaScript with type safety

page-components.title: Page Components
page-components.description: Standard structure for Inertia page components with TypeScript typing and layout assignment

forms.title: Forms & Validation
forms.description: Complete form handling with useForm hook, validation, file uploads, and state management
